sentences: Olemme nähneet tämän jo monta kertaa.
context: The word 'näin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Finnish verb 'nägä-' meaning 'to see'. It specifically means 'I saw' and is used when the speaker is referring to their own action in the past. In Finnish, verbs conjugate based on person (1st, 2nd, 3rd) and number (singular/plural). The word 'näin' belongs to a group of consonant-stem verbs that undergo specific changes in different tenses.
